scripts.build: node-sass sass/App.scss -o spawning-chrome-extension/src --output-style compressed && webpack --config webpack.config.js && mkdir -p build/chrome && mkdir -p build/firefox && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../../build/chrome/chrome.zip . && cd ../firefox && web-ext build --overwrite-dest -a ../../build/firefox
scripts.watch: node-sass sass/App.scss -o spawning-chrome-extension/src --output-style compressed && webpack -w --config webpack.config.js
